para.text: The Mayor shall establish a LIHEAP Heat and Eat initiative for the purpose of providing the maximum standard utility allowance to all participants.
All food stamp program recipients shall be automatically enrolled in the LIHEAP Heat and Eat initiative.
All LIHEAP Heat and Eat participants shall receive a minimum annual benefit of $ 20.01.
Participation in the LIHEAP Heat and Eat initiative shall not preclude any recipient from receiving standard LIHEAP benefits for which he or she is eligible.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 20-155 substituted “$ 20.01” for “$ 1” in (c).
